meanings.definition: The quality or state of being dogged or persistent.
meanings.sent1: Her doggednesses in finishing the project impressed her boss.
meanings.sent2: His doggednesses in training for the marathon paid off with a personal best time.
meanings.sent3: The doggednesses of the squirrel trying to reach the bird feeder was both amusing and admirable.
meanings.sent4: The doggednesses of the detective in solving the case was like a relentless bloodhound on the trail.
meanings.sent5: The mountain climber's doggednesses in reaching the summit against all odds became legendary in the climbing community.

meanings.definition: The act of pursuing something with determination and tenacity.
meanings.sent1: The doggednesses of the explorer in searching for lost treasure was unmatched.
meanings.sent2: The team's doggednesses in chasing down the opposing player led to a turnover.
meanings.sent3: The doggednesses of the cat in trying to catch the laser pointer dot provided endless entertainment.
meanings.sent4: Her doggednesses in pursuing her dream of becoming a doctor was like a marathon with no finish line.
meanings.sent5: The politician's doggednesses in campaigning door-to-door showed true dedication to the community.
